name: FIGHTING GIRL SAKURA-R
description:
The gorgeous action fighting girl Sakura-R is here on Steam!
Fighting Girl Sakura-R is a platformer action game.
Cultivate your character and defeat your enemies.characteristicsBrilliant action and upbringing
You can use various combos and skills to subdue your enemies.
You can grow your character through rewards and level ups.
In-game HCGYou can enjoy in-game HCG if you get knocked down by enemy attacks while playing. You can also enjoy it in EXTRA gallery mode.
Game Over HCGSmooth and colorful illustration animations delight players.

operation keys
z: normal attack
x: skill attack
c: dash skill
v: guard
A: HP recovery
s: MP recovery
d: option key
q: self-harm attack
w: self-harm attack
